Package org.opt4j.core.config.visualization

Class Configurator

java.lang.Object
org.opt4j.core.config.visualization.Configurator
Direct Known Subclasses:
Opt4J
public class Configurator extends Object
The Configurator configures the modules and starts the specific ApplicationFrame.
See Also:
